Zhana Dougherty

Front-End Developer

Welcome!

I am a Freelance Front End Developer, based in Raleigh-Durham, NC.
I live and work in USA, but i was born and raised in Bulgaria, where I got my Bachelors degree in Computer Engineering.
I am a passionate developer, and love to stay up to date with the latest in web development technology. This portfolio is one of the many projects I have been working on in the last year. I enjoy creating complex, custom-built websites using HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, JavaScript and ReactJS.
I also work with CMS platforms, such as Wordpress.
If you would like to hire me, or partner with me on a project, fill out the Form below, or connect with me on LinkedIn.

Work


Movie App

Movie info application, build with React, Redux and custom CSS. I am using fetch API for making requests and fetching the information from The Movie DB. Here you can look up your favorite movie, find more information about the actors or discover new movies and shows from the discover link.

View code

RJD Heating and Cooling

This is a website for a Heating and Cooling company.For creating it I have used Bootstrap, HTML5, custom CSS, and JavaScript. I have implemented HTML tables and forms, CSS hovering effects, JavaScript event listeners. I am also using Google Maps API for the Contact page.

View code

Tech Solutions

A modern website for a company named Tech Solutions. I have built it using SASS pre-processor, which is compiled to regular CSS. I am using ApexCharts.js for the dashboard. For the news page, I am making requests to newsapi.org, using async await and DOM manipulation.

View code

Cafe Website

In this web site I have used my responsive design knowledge. This is a minimalist website, that changes its layout when on mobile mode. I have used HTML and CSS. I have used media queries for the responsiveness.

View code

Why work with me?

Passionate Developer

Always give 100% commintment with anything you do. But 110% with what you love.

Quick Learner

Ability to process and aquire new skills along the way. Always eager to discover new lands.

Team Player

It's great to have others around for input and also to learn from. In return, you should always be willing to share your thoughts and knowledge of what we picked up alont the way.
